'''Xiaodong''' is an [[NPC]] located in [[Port Ormos]], [[Sumeru]].

Following a certain dialogue branch for the first time gives the player four [[Crystal Chunk]]s.

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Xiaodong:''' How come it's still not here after all this time...?
:{{DIcon}} What are you waiting for?
::'''Xiaodong:''' Cargo I ordered.
::'''Xiaodong:''' The tea and ore I brought are all sold out. I'm just waiting to load the blankets and spices from Sumeru so I can get back to [[Liyue Harbor]].
::'''Xiaodong:''' It's just those spices I ordered a long while ago that still haven't showed up...
::'''Xiaodong:''' My contact could only say they're on the road. I think he's just trying to stall me.
::'''Xiaodong:''' It's better to wait at the dock myself.
::{{DIcon|Reward}} Good luck to you.
:::'''Xiaodong:''' Thanks, hope it'll work out as we expect.
:::'''Xiaodong:''' I've got some leftover materials after my last deal. Not that they're of poor quality, they're just a few extra pieces. You can take them if you don't mind.
::;(Obtain [[Crystal Chunk]] ×4)
:{{DIcon}} See you.
::'''Xiaodong:''' Yeah, hope I'll get my shipment soon.
{{Dialogue end}}
